attributes.action: I feel like scalea should have the liberty to be indipendent and free from shops
attributes.additional_details: Everyone and everthing deserves freedom of choice or lifestyle and if the government wants every  single being in this country to live a better life this should be looked into instantly
attributes.background: They should ban all shops and chains of supermarkets because libras deserve to be freed and taken out of their life of slavery from shopkeepers asap

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action by the Government and House of Commons, and we're not sure what you want to happen.

You could start a new petition stating more clearly what it is you want the Government or House of Commons to do.
